sentences.en: Dewdrops sparkle [ glisten ] in the morning sun.
sentences.cn: 露珠在晨光下闪闪发光.

sentences.en: Her eyes began to glisten, and her lids to twinkle.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛开始发亮, 眼皮直眨.

sentences.en: I watched the moonlight glisten on the waters of Laguna Beach.
sentences.cn: 我凝视着倒映在拉古纳湾水面上的月光.

sentences.en: The glisten glazes possess glistening effect only when they are applied on a proper under - glaze.
sentences.cn: 闪光釉只有施在相应的底釉上才具有闪光效果.
叶子上的露水闪闪发光.

sentences.en: The sun was fierce, the land seemed to glisten and drip with steam.
sentences.cn: 天上烈日炎炎, 大地被蒸晒得闪闪发光,热露淋淋.

sentences.en: The tree tops glisten and children, Listen to the sleigh - bells in the snow.
sentences.cn: 树梢彩灯闪闪,孩子们听着雪橇铃响.

sentences.en: Why does my hair glisten a shiny silver?

trans.tran_en: to shine and look wet or oily
